---
title: "Barrier Checks"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
barriers <- read.csv("barrierDates.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
barrierLocs <- read.csv("mergedBarriers.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
barrierVerify <- read.csv("barriersVerify.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
barrierLocs <- mutate(barrierLocs, id = Observatio+BarrierID)
```

```{r}
barrierChecks <- left_join(barriers, barrierLocs, by = "id")
barrierChecks <- left_join(barrierChecks, barrierVerify, by = "id")
```

```{r}
barrierChecks$check <- ifelse(is.na(barrierChecks$BarrierID) == TRUE, "fail", "pass")

barrierChecks <- barrierChecks %>%
  filter(check == "fail")

write.csv(barrierChecks, "barriersMissing.csv")
```
